links.title: Apple makes history with massive new iPhone, Apple Watch
links.description: After months of speculation, Apple finally took the wraps off its new iPhones on Wednesday, including the iPhone Xs Max, its largest iPhone ever. "Today, we're going to take iPhone X to the next level," CEO Tim Cook said during the presentation.
